In order for this vote to be valid there is a quorum of 10% SuperUMAns and 3 UMAsters, with the poll running for 5-7 days. Formal proposals will be announced on a Discord announcements channel **To:** A formal proposal on Discourse can be submitted once the rough proposal in the above stage has received 5 likes. The proposal may be slightly altered, however it should be transparently in the same spirit. This proposal will include a poll with three elements - Yes - More Discussion - No In order for a proposal to pass to a Snapshot vote a simple majority (51% of votes cast) is required for Yes. **The poll will run for 3-7 days**. SUDAO-IP-20:

Snapshot Quorum Change

Rationale:

This document is to ratify our current Snapshot Quorum as written in our SuperUMAn DAO Design Principles.

Content of the Proposal:

  • Change snapshot quorum from needing 50% of total voting power to no quorum.
  • There still needs to be a simple majority (51%) to pass a proposal through snapshot.
  • Remove quorum from the “Formal Proposal and Poll” proposal stage. It will simply need a simple majority (51%) to pass.
  • Change the Discourse poll minimum timeline from 5-7 days to 3-7 days which matches the Snapshot phase.
